mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_CONTENT , C.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN , C.NOTICE_DATE , C.ADMIN_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R , A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , A.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN , A.NOTICE_DATE , A.ADMIN_ID FROM (SELECT B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_CONTENT , B.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN , B.NOTICE_DATE , B.ADMIN_ID FROM TBL_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.NOTICE_NO DESC) A) C
WHERE C.R <= #{ endSelect } AND C.R >= #{ startSelect }
SELECT B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_CONTENT , B.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN , B.NOTICE_DATE , B.ADMIN_ID FROM TBL_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN = 'N' WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE A ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_ACTIVE_YN, NOTICE_DATE, ADMIN_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_TBL_NOTICE.nextval, #{ noticeTitle }, #{ noticeContent } , 'Y' , SYSDATE, 'ADMIN01' )
